reviews.text: How: Bottle.Where: Tasting at BjÃ¶rn, 160129.Appearance: Golden colour with a white head.Aroma: Spices, coriander.Body: Medium body and carbonation.Flavour: Spices, some coriander.
Pours dark amber with a light brown head. Rich beer with a lot of sweet prunes, raisins and mild chocolate. Light acidity and some smoke in the background.
Golden colour. Neutral aroma. Clean taste with a hint of citrus. An average beer.
